answer.explanation: W-Br: Hi, it's your neighbor, Indira. Q1 My return flight was scheduled to leave in an hour and they just announced it’s been canceled. I'm standing in line right now, waiting to talk to a ticket agent. Q2 I'm so tired of traveling, but it looks like I won’t make it home this evening —I think the next flight's in the morning . Can you believe it? Anyway, I have a favor to ask. Q3 Could you go by my house after work? A package was supposed to arrive today, and l’d rather it didn’t just sit in front of my door overnight. I really appreciate it!

answer.explanation: Q1 Welcome to the Hoffman Textiles Facto tour. As most of you know, our factory provides quality fabrics to clothing manufacturers around the world. During the tour of the facility, you'll see the care that goes into making each of our many types of fabrics. Q2 Now, normally we’d start by showing you how fabric is made on the weaving machines, but another tour group is still in that area. So today we’ll start in the final packaging room and do the tour in reverse, visiting the weaving machines at the end. Q3 Then we can offer you a 10% discount on fabric purchases today only.

answer.explanation: Q1 In local news, Westcot Railway officials have revealed a plan for a new railway line to be installed between the capital city, Milton, and the popular tourist destination Greenview City. Construction on the project is scheduled to begin at the end of this year. According to the announcement, Q2 railway cars on the new line will offer travelers more comfortable seats for the twelve-hour train ride. The Travel and Tourism Association has already voiced its strong support for the new railway line. Q3 Jackie Hall, spokesperson for the association, says tourism professionals are happy to see this much-needed upgrade and anticipate a boost to their industry.

question.text: According to the news report, what will happen at the end of the year?
choices: (A) A tourist resort will be renovated.
(B) An airline merger will take place.
(C) Construction on a new railway line will begin.
(D) A hotel association will select a new president.

answer.text: (C) Construction on a new railway line will begin.

answer.explanation: Q1 Welcome to this morning's seminar for freelance writers. Today we’ll be discussing strategies for negotiating contracts between you and your publisher. Q2 l know some people are still on their way, but another conference is scheduled to begin here at one o'clock. So let’s go over some administrative details. Q3 As you know, the parking fee was included in your registration, so I have passes for everyone. I'll come around and hand those out now. Just show it to the attendant on your way out and you won’t be charged.

answer.explanation: Thanks for listening to Radio KVS. Q1 I want to remind all our listeners that our free summer concert series starts next week. Q2 The first show’ll feature legendary guitarist Diinitri Phillips, performing with his band, so this will be a big event! Q2 The performance is next Wednesday in Salsbury Park, beginning at seven, but make sure you get in line early for your free ticket. Attendees can bring in their own food and drink, but certain items are prohibited. Q3 For a full list of what is allowed in the park, check out the park department Web site. And if you can’t make this show, there will be many concerts throughout the summer.

answer.explanation: Q1 Before we talk about our sales results from this year, let me say how pleased I am with the success that Susie's Online Clothing Boutique has been having. Q2 When I started the business last year, I was not sure how well it would do, but the results show that we’ve exceeded our goal! Of course, there’s always room for improvement. We know our biggest rival is Fashion Plus. This chart compares features of the two companies. Q3 If we want to be competitive, we’ll have to offer all the same services. So let’s talk about what we can add to our services so that we can keep up with Fashion Plus.

answer.explanation: Q1 Welcome to the new employee orientation at Tockney Nature Center. We’re happy that you'll be guiding our bird-watching tours! Behind me there’s a trail map of the Nature Center. We'll be walking down trail two so I can show you some interesting spots to take visitors. Q2 You can use the other trails as well, except for this trail right here because there’s family of bald eagles nesting nearby. For the first time, Q3 the Center collaborating with the state university on a research project about eagles. We’re positioned a live camera on one tree there, and we don’t want anything to disturb the birds for the duration of the study.

answer.explanation: Q1 Attention, travelers. The three P.M Bliss Airlines flight to Madrid has been canceled. We regret the inconvenience this may cause you and Q2 ask that you please proceed to the information desk in front of gate three to speak to an airline representative. Bliss Airlines will make every effort to book you on a different flight and get you on your way to your final destination. And thank you for flying with Bliss Airlines.
